title: KINVENT Physio
description:
An interactive suite targeted at rehabilitation and sport professionals for precise biomechanical assessment of movement.

A battery of over 100 evaluations, exercises and serious games in combination with 7 devices :

· Grip, dynamometer
· Muscle Controller, multiple use dynamometer
· Link, pull dynamometer
· Bubble, a pneumatic dynamometer
· Plates, force plates
· Deltas, force plates
· Sens, a goniometer  
 
The App, together with the devices is measuring forces, balance and movement. The targeted exercises with real time biofeedback, the display of progress and the quantified measurements inspire confidence and motivation to the health professionals and their patients.

summary: KINVENT Physio, your assistant in functional rehabilitation
